string.text:
Flask filled with dirty water. You can make it somewhat safer to drink by boiling it.
 
 %c[ui_gray_3]PROPERTIES:
 %c[d_blue] • %c[ui_gray_2] drink

Flask filled with boiled water. You can make it completely safe to drink using purifying pills.
 
 %c[ui_gray_3]PROPERTIES:
 %c[d_blue] • %c[ui_gray_2] drink

Small bottle of pills for purifying boiled water.
 
 %c[ui_gray_3]PROPERTIES:
 %c[d_red] • %c[ui_gray_2] slow usage (dispersible tablets)
